overview: In the news, California often grabs the headlines. In this state, the agriculture is suffering from a lack of water and farms are being abandoned at an alarming rate. But some people seem to have found a solution. Here, and in many other dry regions around the world, land restoration is helping water infiltrate into the soil to help increase crop yields.
tagline: One inch of rain falling on one acre, = 27,000 gallons of water
title: Abundance on a Dry Land
